Pre-Game Insights: The Pittsburgh Pirates (68-76) will face the Miami Marlins (54-90) at PNC Park in Pittsburgh, PA, with a scheduled start time of 7:05 PM ET. The Marlins are listed at +130 on the moneyline, while the Pirates are at -155. The game will be televised on Bally Sports Florida with an over/under total of 8.5 runs. Starting pitchers are Adam Mazur for the Marlins and Bailey Falter for the Pirates.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Marlins have a team batting average of.241 and a team ERA of 4.73, while the Pirates have a batting average of.235 and an ERA of 4.16. The Marlins have 3.8 runs per game, ranking 29th in the league, while the Pirates score 4.24 runs per game, ranking 18th. The Marlins have a slugging percentage of.374, and the Pirates have a slugging percentage of.372.
